title: How to Bake a Loaf of Pullman Bread

steps.headline: Add all the ingredients to a bread maker pan.
Remove dough and shape into a 9-inch loaf.
Place dough in Pullman Loaf pan.
Cover pan with plastic food wrap.
Let bread rise for about for 1 hour or until the bread dough is about 1/2-inch from the top of the pan.
Place Pullman Loaf pan lid on bread pan.
Remove bread pan lid.
steps.description: Be careful so you do not burn yourself.

steps.headline: Return bread loaf to the oven and bake 5 to 10 minutes more.
steps.description: The bread should be a golden brown.

text: Add all the ingredients to a bread maker pan.  Select dough cycle.  Remove dough and shape into a 9-inch loaf.  Place dough in Pullman Loaf pan.  Cover pan with plastic food wrap.  Let bread rise for about for 1 hour or until the bread dough is about 1/2-inch from the top of the pan.  Preheat oven to 350 °F (177 °C).  Remove the plastic wrap.  Place Pullman Loaf pan lid on bread pan.  Bake bread for 25 minutes.  Remove bread pan lid. Be careful so you do not burn yourself. Return bread loaf to the oven and bake 5 to 10 minutes more. The bread should be a golden brown. Finished.
